text: Faqir Chand Kohli (19 March 1924 â€“ 26 November 2020), popularly known as F. C. Kohli, was an Indian engineer and software businessman. He was known as the Father of the Indian Software Industry.Cognizant rising by Chennai beach He was the founder and first CEO of Tata Consultancy Services, India's largest software company. He was the deputy general manager of the Tata Power Company. He was Chairman of the Board of Governors of College of Engineering, Pune. Kohli died of a heart attack on 26 November 2020 at the age of 96. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian businesspeople Category:Indian engineers Category:Software engineers
